methods: void deleteAllData() Clears all storage currently being used by the JavaScript storage APIs.
void deleteOrigin(String origin) Clears the storage currently being used by both the Application Cache and Web SQL Database APIs by the given origin.
static WebStorage getInstance() Gets the singleton instance of this class.
void getOrigins(ValueCallback<Map> callback) Gets the origins currently using either the Application Cache or Web SQL Database APIs.
void getQuotaForOrigin(String origin, ValueCallback<Long> callback) Gets the storage quota for the Web SQL Database API for the given origin.
void getUsageForOrigin(String origin, ValueCallback<Long> callback) Gets the amount of storage currently being used by both the Application Cache and Web SQL Database APIs by the given origin.
void setQuotaForOrigin(String origin, long quota) This method was deprecated in API level 18. Controlling quota per-origin will not be supported in future.
